EmailTemplate.name: NPS SUrvey Jan 2015
EmailTemplate.subject: Adaptive 3-Question Survey
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!JBCXM__SurveyParticipant__c.First__c}:
Have a minute? Please help us improve by completing a quick, three-question survey to tell us whether you would recommend Adaptive to your colleagues.
Please click the link to take the survey. (If you have problems loading this survey, you may also copy the entire link into your web browser.) {!JBCXM__SurveyParticipant__c.JBCXM__SurveyURL__c}?surveyId={!JBCXM__SurveyParticipant__c.JBCXM__SurveyId__c}âˆ‚icipantId={!JBCXM__SurveyParticipant__c.JBCXM__Token__c}
Thank you for helping us improve.
Best Regards,
Adaptive Insights Customer Success Team The Global Leader in Cloud BI & CPM
